    Publications

      Magaña, P. et al. (2020) ‘Pegylated species separation through an innovative PEG-grafted agarose-based resin, association quantified by microcalorimetry’, Separation and Purification Technology.

    • Ultra-rapid and low-cost fabrication of centrifugal microfluidic platforms with active mechanical valves

      M. M. Aeinehvand. et al. (2017) ‘Ultra-rapid and low-cost fabrication of centrifugal microfluidic platforms with active mechanical valves’, RSC Adv., 2017,7, 55400-55407
